author: mitaylor
body:
backport of #42632 and #42245 

#### PR description:

In the ongoing L1T Offline Software effort to move away from maintaining a parallel fork of CMSSW for Phase 1 development we have been requested to migrate caloParams files used for testing of the L1T system to a central location for their broader usage by L1T developers. This should represent all 2022 and 2023 Heavy Ion caloParams, including the v0_4 for Heavy Ion and pp reference.

#### PR validation:

These files represent L1 configuration to be stored centrally, and is not involved in any central workflows.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

Exact backport of #42632 and #42245. Needed in 13_2_X for the Heavy Ion data taking and L1 emulation studies based in 13_2_X.

@bundocka @aloeliger
title: [13_2_X] Port of 2022 and 2023 HI L1T CaloParams
